short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EasySearch will set your default search provider to blpsearch.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EasySearch by aztec lets you quickly search the web from your address bar by configuring Default Search setting to blpsearch.com

Please read carefully: By clicking the “ADD TO CHROME” button in the top right hand corner and installing the EasySearch, you agree to install this extension, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy and to receiving any future updates and upgrades. 
You can uninstall the extension at any time from the chrome extensions page or from the extensions bar on the top right of your browser
Terms:
http://www.blpsearch.com/terms
Privacy Policy:
http://www.blpsearch.com/privacy_policy
